medical_history.chief_complaint: Right upper quadrant pain after eating.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient developed increasing right upper quadrant pain several hours after eating a salmon sandwich. The pain is mostly in the right upper quadrant, but intermittently occurs in the epigastrium. The patient denied nausea, vomiting, fever, or chills.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of coronary artery disease (CAD) status post angioplasty; hypertension (HTN); recent routine colonoscopy and polypectomy.
